title: Junior Graphic Designer (Remote Internship - Graphic Design)
Graphic Designer
about_the_job:
Responsibilities

Unpaid Graphics Design Internship

(Virtual or Remote)

Benefits of this Internship?

3 certificates, One Certificate of Internship and two certificates related to their training at GAOTek Inc.
Get free training with professional and managerial staff from GAOTek Inc.
A lot of knowledge because you can dive straight into the world of work for fresh graduates.
Mentorship and guidance from experienced business development professionals.
Virtual and flexible, candidates can work from anywhere with a flexible schedule. 
Candidates do not have to pay any fees. On the other hand, the program does not offer candidates any compensation either.

Please understand that we only take candidates who are seriously interested in this internship opportunity and who are willing to work hard to learn, be productive and make contributions. Candidates do not have to pay any fees. On the other hand, the program does not offer candidates any compensation either. You are required to commit a duration of 3 to 6 months and a minimum of 20 hours per week. You can divide it freely as your free time. For example, you want to work 5 hours/day. Then, you only need 4 days to reach that 20hours commitment.

Duration Of The Internship

Shortest duration is 3 months
Longest duration is 6 months

Job Description

Create graphics, Edit images and videos.
Participate in a team to organize virtual (online) global conferences.
Use social media platforms such as LinkedIn to invite conference speakers, attendees, or sponsors.
Perform social marketing to promote the conferences and events and our products.
Agenda preparation, care of speakers, attendees, and sponsors, and events coordination.

Requirements

University Students that related to the field or position, people who have experiences in the related field, and people who have no experiences but have a strong interest in related field but of course with a supporting educational background.
Have an English skill (Since we are international company, then English is used for work, make daily/weekly report, and for weekly meeting with team leader).
People who willing to learn a lot of things and didn't expect any payment so just learned to work.
People who have time management since this is remote work, and usually didn’t have much time to learn to work seriously.
People who can commit to learn within a period determined by the company.

title: Freelance Graphic Designer (8 Hours / Day)
about_the_job:
About Us

Lion & Lion is an award-winning, digital agency operating in Southeast Asia focusing on delivering impact to its clients’ businesses with an integrated, data-driven and strategically led approach to digital marketing. With offices in Kuala Lumpur, Singapore and Jakarta, and more than 120 digital specialists, Lion & Lion has a prestigious and growing portfolio of clients including Google, Bayer, F&N, Emborg, and more.

Your role

Designs and creates visual assets for all digital channels; social media, mobile, apps through style guides and optimized graphics for each format.
Comes up with Motion Graphics and determining technical requirements. Able to conceptualize, visualize and execute design projects diligently and in a timely manner.
Approaches projects as a team player.
Is a self-starter and stays self-motivated.
Thrives and innovates under challenging deadlines.

Your profile

Must have at least a Diploma/Degree in Graphic Design/Web Design/Multimedia or anything of its equivalent.
Preferably with two years working experience in the digital agency.
Must be familiar with Macintosh OS.
Must have the needed skills to use Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After effect and Adobe Premier.
Have excellent communication and interpersonal skills for both written and oral, especially in English.
Be independent, meticulous, proactive, results oriented, and able to work with minimum supervision.

title: Graphic Designer
about_the_job:
As a Graphic Designer at Truecare Novatech Indonesia, you will play a crucial role in visually communicating the brand's essence and promoting our products through creative and engaging designs. Your work will contribute to enhancing the overall aesthetic appeal of our marketing materials, packaging, and online presence. We are looking for a talented and passionate individual who can bring innovative design concepts to life and help elevate our brand in the competitive skincare industry.

Minimum Qualifications

 Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or a related field.
 Proven experience as a graphic designer, preferably in the beauty or skincare industry. A portfolio showcasing a diverse range of design projects is required.
 Advanced skills in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, etc.) and other relevant design tools.
 Strong creative and conceptual thinking, with the ability to bring innovative ideas to the table.
 Meticulous attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality, polished designs.
 Effective communication skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams and interpret design briefs.
 Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, meet deadlines, and work efficiently under pressure.
 A genuine interest in the skincare industry and a keen understanding of beauty and wellness trends.

title: Senior Graphic Designer
about_the_job:
About The Role

The Senior Graphic Designer is responsible for bringing design & visual solutions to life that adhere to teams marketing strategies and business goals.

Our team has trust and affection towards our products. Thus our Graphic Designers work as a bridge that connects our customers to our brand through producing designs and visuals that reflect the team's message.

Job Description

Oversee design projects, from conception/visualization to delivery. (Launch, Collaboration, Ads etc)
Review team's work to ensure high quality.
Generate ideas to portray concepts and advertise products/services.
Maintain brand consistency throughout all our projects.
Liaise with other members to ensure deadlines are met.

Requirements And Skills

Minimum 3 years of experience as a Senior Designer, Graphic Designer or similar role.
Interest in Sportswear, Fashion Editorial.
Ability to manage multiple projects at the same time and to work on close deadlines in a fast phase team
Pay attention to detail.
Bachelor's degree in Design, Visual Arts or relevant field.
Portfolio & CV is compulsory.

title: Graphic Designer
about_the_job:
Company Description: Sari Sarana Kimiatama didirikan oleh pendiri UD. Sinar Warna pada tahun 1966 sebagai produsen dan pemasok pengencer dan cat. Sebagai agen resmi PT PERTAMINA (Persero) di Divisi Petrokimia, kami mengubah perusahaan menjadi PT Sari Sarana Kimia. Bertumbuh dan sukses menjadi perusahaan kimia profesional untuk memasok pelanggan kami, PT Sari Sarana Kimia mengembangkan beberapa perusahaan manufaktur dan logistik yang telah menjadi perusahaan terkemuka di Indonesia. PT Tunas Sumber Ideakreasi Kimia (Tunas Resin) PT Bumimerak Terminalindo dan PT Bumimerak Transportasi (BMT) PT Sari Daya Plasindo PT Sarana Sejahtera Kurnia Pada tahun 2013, PT Sari Sarana Kimia telah menjadi Holding Companies dengan sedikit entitas dan mendirikan perusahaan baru untuk Importir Bahan Kimia dan Perusahaan Logistik dengan nama baru PT Sari Sarana Kimiatama dengan 100% kepemilikan SSK Group. Job Description:

 Develop concept and create well designed artworks for all marketing collateral on various media, such as : banners, brochures, catalogs, exhibition booths, etc.
 Edit and retouch product (photo/video/text).
 Creating social media content according to company guidelines.
 Work closely with the creative team to ensure the consistency of design on various platforms.
 Able to present ideas to the team and stakeholders.

title: Graphic Designer in Skin care Company (Ledolla)
company_type: See how you compare to 68 applicants. Try Premium for IDR0
about_the_job:
The Opportunity

Are you fun, flexible and overflowing with inspiration? Le d'Olla is looking for a creative problem solver ready to take on challenging design briefs. Join us if you have an eye for beauty and commitment to crafting exceptional brand designs.

What You’ll Learn

Develop design concepts for business objectives and goals (Role related)
 You'll learn how to deliver value to projects through objective-based design such as developing the style and vision for our brand(s) through market analysis and research
 You’ll get to design for business success for creative and effective delivery of branding services
Manage various stakeholders and project requirements (Personal growth)
 You’ll have the opportunity to work with sales and marketing teams to ensure collaterals are delivered on time
 You’ll manage multiple projects with concurrent deadlines, ensuring high quality and accuracy of marketing materials through proofreading
Develop design briefs by gathering information and creating solutions(Beauty Industry)
 By working in our company, you’ll be exposed to the exciting branding projects
 You’ll have access to creative resources and stellar marketing ideas for your design journey

Job Description

Create Visual Brand Identity
 Conceptualise and design branding/marketing materials or advertisements
 Produce new artwork based on brand guidelines agreed with our marketing team
 Create print and digital advertising materials
Develop Key Visuals and Collaterals for Marketing Campaigns
 Create brand identity and style guide for the company’s marketing needs
 Assist in management of website, newsletters and all other company materials, where necessary
 Design all graphic, sales and marketing materials e.g. EDM / Posters / Banners / Sales Display
Manage Design from Concept to Production
 Work according to briefs for the branding needs and guidelines
 Ensure design specifications are production-ready
 Engage with external printers or contractors/suppliers/vendors to ensure highest quality and deadlines are met
 Proper documentation of all design files

title: Creative Designer (Marketplace - Somethinc)
company_type: 201-500 employees · Retail Health and Personal Care Products
about_the_job:
About The Company

Beautyhaul is one of the fastest-growing beauty companies in Indonesia that aspires to be the largest vertically integrated beauty ecosystem from supply to retail. Due to its exponential growth, the company has attracted investment from a reputable investor, Sequoia Capital.

Our first brand ''Somethinc'' was founded in 2019, is currently the #1 skincare brand in e-commerce & modern trade with >1M social media followings. Our second brand Glowinc is breaking the boundaries by offering genderless products at affordable prices. Our offline/online commerce Beautyhaul is the core for carrying multiple brands that we have directly to our customers. We are incubating more and more business models in our platform and aim to be a strong regional player in the beauty, within the South Asia region.

Job Descriptions:

Create and provide creative materials & key visual for promotional banner that based on monthly campaign for all Somethinc Marketplace
Create simple animation or motion graphic, audio, and visual effects to create moving content and all promotional ads for product launch or promotional campaign
Providing Product Detail Page (PDP) with promo, according to campaign from sales team
Working on assets for livestream on all somethinc accounts


Requirements:

Min. Bachelor Degree from Multimedia, Visual Design Communication, or any related major
Proficient in using Adobe software (Ai, Ps, Ae, Pr)
Have experience in designing promo banners or marketplace design
Beauty Enthusiast and have a great communication skill
Out of the box and able to work in a fast paced company
Able to join ASAP
Willing to WFO (Blugreen Integrated Office, Puri Kembangan, Jakarta Barat)


P.S Please attach your CV & Portfolio in pdf format

We have a 'CREATE' culture (Collaborative, Responsible, Eccentric, Agile, Tough, Effective). We are looking for more people to join us, who are excited to disrupt the traditional beauty industry with product innovation and non-linear growth, who want to build a profitable start-up into a unicorn company, who will always learn and do the right thing.
